message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am willing to sell the product to you for $11500. This price reflects its high value and ensures a fair transaction for both parties.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've mentioned.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product and aiming for a mutually beneficial arrangement, I propose to sell the product to you for $11000. This price reflects a compromise that respects both the value of the product and your budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've mentioned.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. To reach a satisfactory conclusion, I would like to offer the product to you for $10950. This price takes into account the value you see in the product while allowing us to maintain a fair transaction. I hope this proposal aligns with your expectations.
I understand your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $10700 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've mentioned.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. To facilitate a transaction that is agreeable to both of us, I propose to sell the product to you for $10850. This price reflects a reasonable compromise between the value you see in the product and my asking price.
